trans-unit.source: Provides version information for a physical file on disk.
trans-unit.target: 为磁盘上的物理文件提供版本信息。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number".
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，版本号被显示为"主要版本号.次部件号"。

trans-unit.source: A file version number is a 64-bit number that holds the version number for a file as follows:
trans-unit.target: 文件版本号是一个 64 位数字，如下所示包含文件的版本号：

trans-unit.source: The first 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileMajorPart%2A> number.
The next 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileMinorPart%2A> number.
The third set of 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileBuildPart%2A> number.
The last 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FilePrivatePart%2A> number.

Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> method of this class to get a <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> containing information about a file, then look at the properties for information about the file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A>方法的此类，以获取<xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo>包含文件信息，然后查看有关文件信息的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileVersion%2A> property provides version information about the file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileVersion%2A>属性提供有关文件的版本信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductMajorPart%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductMinorPart%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductPrivatePart%2A>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductVersion%2A> properties provide version information for the product that the specified file is a part of.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductMajorPart%2A>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductMinorPart%2A>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart%2A>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductPrivatePart%2A>，和<xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductVersion%2A>属性提供了指定的文件是的一部分的产品的版本信息。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ToString%2A> to get a partial list of properties and their values for this file.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ToString%2A>若要获取此文件的属性及其值的部分列表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> properties are based on version resource information built into the file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo>属性基于内置于文件的版本资源信息。

trans-unit.source: Version resources are often built into binary files such as .exe or .dll files; text files do not have version resource information.
trans-unit.target: 版本资源通常内置二进制文件，如.exe 或.dll 文件;文本的文件不存在版本资源信息。

trans-unit.source: Version resources are typically specified in a Win32 resource file, or in assembly attributes.
trans-unit.target: 在 Win32 资源文件，或在程序集特性，通常未指定版本资源。

trans-unit.source: For example the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.IsDebug%2A> property reflects the `VS_FF_DEBUG` flag value in the file's `VS_FIXEDFILEINFO` block, which is built from the `VERSIONINFO` resource in a Win32 resource file.
trans-unit.target: 例如<xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.IsDebug%2A>属性反映`VS_FF_DEBUG`标记文件的中值`VS_FIXEDFILEINFO`块，从生成`VERSIONINFO`Win32 资源文件中的资源。

trans-unit.source: For more information about specifying version resources in a Win32 resource file, see "About Resource Files" and "VERSIONINFO Resource" in the Platform SDK.
trans-unit.target: 有关在 Win32 资源文件中指定版本资源的详细信息，请参阅"关于资源文件中"和"VERSIONINFO 资源"的平台 SDK 中。

trans-unit.source: For more information about specifying version resources in a .NET module, see the [Setting Assembly Attributes](~/docs/framework/app-domains/set-assembly-attributes.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关.NET 模块中指定版本资源的详细信息，请参阅[设置程序集特性](~/docs/framework/app-domains/set-assembly-attributes.md)主题。

trans-unit.source: This class makes a link demand at the class level that applies to all members.
trans-unit.target: 此类，使在类级别应用于所有成员的链接要求。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when the immediate caller does not have full trust permission.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>直接调用方没有完全信任权限时，将引发。

trans-unit.source: For details about link demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关链接要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it prints the file description and version number in a text box.
trans-unit.target: 然后它将打印在文本框中的说明和版本数。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能由部分受信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the comments associated with the file.
trans-unit.target: 获取与文件关联的注释。

trans-unit.source: The comments associated with the file or <see langword="null" /> if the file did not contain version information.
trans-unit.target: 与文件关联的注释，当文件不包含版本信息时则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property contains additional information that can be displayed for diagnostic purposes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含可用于诊断目的的其他信息。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it prints the comments in a text box.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它将打印在文本框中的注释。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
Gets the name of the company that produced the file.
trans-unit.target: 获取生成此文件的公司的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the company that produced the file or <see langword="null" /> if the file did not contain version information.
trans-unit.target: 生成文件的公司的名称，当文件不包含版本信息时则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it prints the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.CompanyName%2A> in a text box.
This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
Gets the build number of the file.
A value representing the build number of the file or <see langword="null" /> if the file did not contain version information.
trans-unit.target: 表示文件生成号的值，当文件不包含版本信息时则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number".
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，版本号被显示为"主要版本号.次部件号"。

trans-unit.source: A file version number is a 64-bit number that holds the version number for a file as follows:
trans-unit.target: 文件版本号是一个 64 位数字，如下所示包含文件的版本号：

trans-unit.source: The first 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileMajorPart%2A> number.
The next 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileMinorPart%2A> number.
The third set of 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileBuildPart%2A> number.
The last 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FilePrivatePart%2A> number.
This property gets the third set of 16 bits.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取第三个组 16 位。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it prints the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileBuildPart%2A> in a text box.
This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
Gets the description of the file.
The description of the file or <see langword="null" /> if the file did not contain version information.
trans-unit.target: 文件说明，当文件不包含版本信息时则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it prints the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileDescription%2A> in a text box.
This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
Gets the major part of the version number.
trans-unit.target: 获取版本号的主要版本号部分。

trans-unit.source: A value representing the major part of the version number or 0 (zero) if the file did not contain version information.
trans-unit.target: 表示版本号主要部分的值，当文件不包含版本信息时则为 0（零）。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number".
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，版本号被显示为"主要版本号.次部件号"。

trans-unit.source: A file version number is a 64-bit number that holds the version number for a file as follows:
trans-unit.target: 文件版本号是一个 64 位数字，如下所示包含文件的版本号：

trans-unit.source: The first 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileMajorPart%2A> number.
The next 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileMinorPart%2A> number.
The third set of 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileBuildPart%2A> number.
The last 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FilePrivatePart%2A> number.
This property gets the first set of 16 bits.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取 16 位的第一的组。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it prints the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileMajorPart%2A> in a text box.
This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
Gets the minor part of the version number of the file.
trans-unit.target: 获取文件版本号的次要部分。

trans-unit.source: A value representing the minor part of the version number of the file or 0 (zero) if the file did not contain version information.
trans-unit.target: 表示文件版本号次要部分的值，当文件不包含版本信息时则为 0（零）。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number".
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，版本号被显示为"主要版本号.次部件号"。

trans-unit.source: A file version number is a 64-bit number that holds the version number for a file as follows:
trans-unit.target: 文件版本号是一个 64 位数字，如下所示包含文件的版本号：

trans-unit.source: The first 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileMajorPart%2A> number.
The next 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileMinorPart%2A> number.
The third set of 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileBuildPart%2A> number.
The last 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FilePrivatePart%2A> number.
This property gets the second set of 16 bits.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取第二个集的 16 位。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it prints the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileMinorPart%2A> in a text box.
This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
Gets the name of the file that this instance of <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo" /> describes.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo" /> 的此实例所描述的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file described by this instance of <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo" /> 的此实例所描述的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it prints the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileName%2A> in a text box.
This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
to get the file name.
Associated enumeration: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" />
Gets the file private part number.
A value representing the file private part number or <see langword="null" /> if the file did not contain version information.
trans-unit.target: 表示文件专用部件号的值，当文件不包含版本信息时则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number".
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，版本号被显示为"主要版本号.次部件号"。

trans-unit.source: A file version number is a 64-bit number that holds the version number for a file as follows:
trans-unit.target: 文件版本号是一个 64 位数字，如下所示包含文件的版本号：

trans-unit.source: The first 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileMajorPart%2A> number.
The next 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileMinorPart%2A> number.
The third set of 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileBuildPart%2A> number.
The last 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FilePrivatePart%2A> number.
This property gets the last set of 16 bits.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取设置的最后一个的 16 位。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it prints the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FilePrivatePart%2A> in a text box.
This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
Gets the file version number.
The version number of the file or <see langword="null" /> if the file did not contain version information.
trans-unit.target: 文件的版本号，当文件不包含版本信息时则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number".
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，版本号被显示为"主要版本号.次部件号"。

trans-unit.source: A file version number is a 64-bit number that holds the version number for a file as follows:
trans-unit.target: 文件版本号是一个 64 位数字，如下所示包含文件的版本号：

trans-unit.source: The first 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileMajorPart%2A> number.
The next 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileMinorPart%2A> number.
The third set of 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileBuildPart%2A> number.
The last 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FilePrivatePart%2A> number.
The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it prints the file description and version number in a text box.
trans-unit.target: 然后它将打印在文本框中的说明和版本数。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
The fully qualified path and name of the file to retrieve the version information for.
trans-unit.target: 要检索其版本信息的文件的完全限定路径和名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo" /> representing the version information associated with the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示与指定文件关联的版本信息的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo" /> containing information about the file.
If the file did not contain version information, the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo" /> contains only the name of the file requested.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件不包含版本信息，则 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo" /> 仅包含所请求文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for Notepad and displays the file description and version number in the console window.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A>获取<xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo>记事本并显示文件描述和版本号码在控制台窗口。

trans-unit.source: The file specified cannot be found.
to get the version information.
Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />
for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能由部分受信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the internal name of the file, if one exists.
trans-unit.target: 获取文件的内部名称（如果存在）。

trans-unit.source: The internal name of the file.
If none exists, this property will contain the original name of the file without the extension.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在内部名称，则该属性将包含文件的原始名称（不带扩展名）。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it prints the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.InternalName%2A> in a text box.
This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
Gets a value that specifies whether the file contains debugging information or is compiled with debugging features enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指定文件是否包含调试信息或在调试功能启用的情况下进行编译。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the file contains debugging information or is compiled with debugging features enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件包含调试信息或在调试功能启用的情况下进行编译，值为 <see langword="true" />；反之，值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> properties are based on version resource information built into the file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo>属性基于内置于文件的版本资源信息。

trans-unit.source: Version resources are often built into binary files such as .exe or .dll files; text files do not have version resource information.
trans-unit.target: 版本资源通常内置二进制文件，如.exe 或.dll 文件;文本的文件不存在版本资源信息。

trans-unit.source: Version resources are typically specified in a Win32 resource file, or in assembly attributes.
trans-unit.target: 在 Win32 资源文件，或在程序集特性，通常未指定版本资源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.IsDebug%2A> property reflects the `VS_FF_DEBUG` flag value in the file's `VS_FIXEDFILEINFO` block, which is built from the `VERSIONINFO` resource in a Win32 resource file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.IsDebug%2A>属性反映`VS_FF_DEBUG`标记文件的中值`VS_FIXEDFILEINFO`块，从生成`VERSIONINFO`Win32 资源文件中的资源。

trans-unit.source: For more information about specifying version resources in a Win32 resource file, see the Platform SDK `About Resource Files` topic and `VERSIONINFO Resource` topic topics.
trans-unit.target: 有关在 Win32 资源文件中指定版本资源的详细信息，请参阅平台 SDK`About Resource Files`主题和`VERSIONINFO Resource`主题主题。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it displays the state of the Boolean <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.IsDebug%2A> in a text box.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它显示的布尔值的状态<xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.IsDebug%2A>在文本框中。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
Gets a value that specifies whether the file has been modified and is not identical to the original shipping file of the same version number.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指定该文件是否已修改，且不同于相同版本号的原始发行文件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the file is patched; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该文件修补过，值为 <see langword="true" />；反之，值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it displays the state of the Boolean <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.IsPatched%2A> in a text box.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它显示的布尔值的状态<xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.IsPatched%2A>在文本框中。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
Gets a value that specifies whether the file is a development version, rather than a commercially released product.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指定该文件是否为开发版本，而不是用于商业目的的发行版。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the file is prerelease; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该文件是预发行版本，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it displays whether this version is a prerelease version in a text box.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它显示此版本是否在文本框中的预发布版本。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
Gets a value that specifies whether the file was built using standard release procedures.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指定文件是否采用标准的发行过程生成。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the file is a private build; <see langword="false" /> if the file was built using standard release procedures or if the file did not contain version information.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件为专用版本，值为 <see langword="true" />；如果文件是采用标准发行过程生成的或如果文件不包含版本信息，则值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this value is `true`, <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.PrivateBuild%2A> will describe how this version of the file differs from the standard version.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值为`true`，<xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.PrivateBuild%2A>将介绍此版本的文件的标准版本的不同方式。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it displays the private build information in a text box.
trans-unit.target: 然后在文本框中显示的专用生成信息。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
Gets a value that specifies whether the file is a special build.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指定该文件是否为特殊内部版本。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the file is a special build; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该文件为特殊内部版本，值为 <see langword="true" />；反之，值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A file that is a special build was built using standard release procedures, but the file differs from a standard file of the same version number.
trans-unit.target: 为特殊内部版本的文件使用标准的发行过程生成，但该文件不同于相同版本号的标准文件。

trans-unit.source: If this value is `true`, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.SpecialBuild%2A> property must specify how this file differs from the standard version.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值为`true`、<xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.SpecialBuild%2A>属性必须指定此文件的标准版本的不同方式。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it displays whether this version is a special build version in a text box.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它显示此版本是否为特殊内部版本在文本框中。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
Gets the default language string for the version info block.
trans-unit.target: 获取版本信息区的默认语言字符串。

trans-unit.source: The description string for the Microsoft Language Identifier in the version resource or <see langword="null" /> if the file did not contain version information.
trans-unit.target: 版本资源中 Microsoft 语言标识符的描述字符串，当文件不包含版本信息时则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets all copyright notices that apply to the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 获取所有适用于指定文件的版权声明。

trans-unit.source: The copyright notices that apply to the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 适用于指定文件的版权声明。

trans-unit.source: This should include the full text of all notices, legal symbols, copyright dates, and so on or `null` if the file did not contain version information.
trans-unit.target: 这应包括所有通知、 合法符号、 版权日期和等等的完整文本或`null`当文件不包含版本信息。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it prints the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.LegalCopyright%2A> in a text box.
This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
Gets the trademarks and registered trademarks that apply to the file.
trans-unit.target: 获取应用到文件的商标和注册商标。

trans-unit.source: The trademarks and registered trademarks that apply to the file or <see langword="null" /> if the file did not contain version information.
trans-unit.target: 应用到文件的商标和注册商标，当文件不包含版本信息时则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The legal trademarks include the full text of all notices, legal symbols, and trademark numbers.
trans-unit.target: 合法商标包括所有通知、 合法符号和商标号的完整的文本。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it prints the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.LegalTrademarks%2A> in a text box.
This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
Gets the name the file was created with.
trans-unit.target: 获取创建文件时所使用的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name the file was created with or <see langword="null" /> if the file did not contain version information.
trans-unit.target: 创建文件时使用的名称，当文件不包含版本信息时则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property enables an application to determine whether a file has been renamed.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使应用程序，以确定是否已重命名文件。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it prints the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.OriginalFilename%2A> in a text box.
This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
Gets information about a private version of the file.
trans-unit.target: 获取文件私有版本的信息。

trans-unit.source: Information about a private version of the file or <see langword="null" /> if the file did not contain version information.
trans-unit.target: 文件私有版本的信息，当文件不包含版本信息时则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This information is present when <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.IsPrivateBuild%2A> is `true`.
The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it prints the private build information in a text box.
trans-unit.target: 然后它将打印在文本框中的专用生成信息。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
Gets the build number of the product this file is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 获取该文件关联产品的生成号。

trans-unit.source: A value representing the build number of the product this file is associated with or <see langword="null" /> if the file did not contain version information.
trans-unit.target: 表示与此文件关联的产品的生成号的值，当文件不包含版本信息时则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number".
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，版本号被显示为"主要版本号.次部件号"。

trans-unit.source: A product version number is a 64-bit number that holds the version number as follows:
trans-unit.target: 产品版本号是一个 64 位数字，如下所示包含版本号：

trans-unit.source: The first 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductMajorPart%2A> number.
The next 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductMinorPart%2A> number.
The third set of 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart%2A> number.
The last 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductPrivatePart%2A> number.
This property gets the third set of 16 bits.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取第三个组 16 位。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it prints the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart%2A> in a text box.
This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
Gets the major part of the version number for the product this file is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此文件关联的产品版本号的主要部分。

trans-unit.source: A value representing the major part of the product version number or <see langword="null" /> if the file did not contain version information.
trans-unit.target: 表示产品版本号主要部分的值，当文件不包含版本信息时则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number".
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，版本号被显示为"主要版本号.次部件号"。

trans-unit.source: A product version number is a 64-bit number that holds the version number as follows:
trans-unit.target: 产品版本号是一个 64 位数字，如下所示包含版本号：

trans-unit.source: The first 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductMajorPart%2A> number.
The next 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductMinorPart%2A> number.
The third set of 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart%2A> number.
The last 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductPrivatePart%2A> number.
This property gets the first set of 16 bits.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取 16 位的第一的组。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it prints the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductMajorPart%2A> in a text box.
This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
Gets the minor part of the version number for the product the file is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 获取文件关联产品版本号的次要部分。

trans-unit.source: A value representing the minor part of the product version number or <see langword="null" /> if the file did not contain version information.
trans-unit.target: 表示产品版本号次要部分的值，当文件不包含版本信息时则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number".
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，版本号被显示为"主要版本号.次部件号"。

trans-unit.source: A product version number is a 64-bit number that holds the version number as follows:
trans-unit.target: 产品版本号是一个 64 位数字，如下所示包含版本号：

trans-unit.source: The first 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductMajorPart%2A> number.
The next 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductMinorPart%2A> number.
The third set of 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart%2A> number.
The last 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductPrivatePart%2A> number.
This property gets the second set of 16 bits.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取第二个集的 16 位。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it prints the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductMinorPart%2A> in a text box.
This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
Gets the name of the product this file is distributed with.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此文件一起发行的产品的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the product this file is distributed with or <see langword="null" /> if the file did not contain version information.
trans-unit.target: 与此文件一起发行的产品的名称，当文件不包含版本信息则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it prints the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductName%2A> in a text box.
This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
Gets the private part number of the product this file is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 获取此文件关联产品的专用部件号。

trans-unit.source: A value representing the private part number of the product this file is associated with or <see langword="null" /> if the file did not contain version information.
trans-unit.target: 表示生成文件时关联的专用部件号的值，或者如果文件不包含版本信息，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number".
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，版本号被显示为"主要版本号.次部件号"。

trans-unit.source: A product version number is a 64-bit number that holds the version number as follows:
trans-unit.target: 产品版本号是一个 64 位数字，如下所示包含版本号：

trans-unit.source: The first 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductMajorPart%2A> number.
The next 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductMinorPart%2A> number.
The third set of 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart%2A> number.
The last 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductPrivatePart%2A> number.
This property gets the last set of 16 bits.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取设置的最后一个的 16 位。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it prints the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductPrivatePart%2A> in a text box.
This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
Gets the version of the product this file is distributed with.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此文件一起发行的产品的版本。

trans-unit.source: The version of the product this file is distributed with or <see langword="null" /> if the file did not contain version information.
trans-unit.target: 与此文件一起发行的产品的版本，当文件不包含版本信息时则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number".
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，版本号被显示为"主要版本号.次部件号"。

trans-unit.source: A product version number is a 64-bit number that holds the version number as follows:
trans-unit.target: 产品版本号是一个 64 位数字，如下所示包含版本号：

trans-unit.source: The first 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductMajorPart%2A> number.
The next 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductMinorPart%2A> number.
The third set of 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart%2A> number.
The last 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductPrivatePart%2A> number.
The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it prints the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductVersion%2A> in a text box.
This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
Gets the special build information for the file.
trans-unit.target: 获取文件的特殊内部版本信息。

trans-unit.source: The special build information for the file or <see langword="null" /> if the file did not contain version information.
trans-unit.target: 文件的特殊内部版本信息，当文件不包含版本信息时则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.IsSpecialBuild%2A> is `true`, <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.SpecialBuild%2A> must specify how this file differs from the standard version of the file.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.IsSpecialBuild%2A>是`true`，<xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.SpecialBuild%2A>必须指定此文件的文件的标准版本的不同方式。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it prints the special build information in a text box.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它将打印在文本框中的特殊内部版本信息。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
Returns a partial list of properties in the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo" /> and their values.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo" /> 中属性及相应值的部分列表。

trans-unit.source: A list of the following properties in this class and their values:
trans-unit.target: 该类中下列属性及相应值的列表：

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileName" />, <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.InternalName" />, <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.OriginalFilename" />, <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileVersion" />, <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileDescription" />, <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductName" />, <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductVersion" />, <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.IsDebug" />, <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.IsPatched" />, <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.IsPreRelease" />, <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.IsPrivateBuild" />, <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.IsSpecialBuild" />,
<see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.Language" />.
If the file did not contain version information, this list will contain only the name of the requested file.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件不包含版本信息，则此列表将只包含所请求文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Boolean values will be <see langword="false" />, and all other entries will be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 布尔值将为 <see langword="false" />，其他所有项将为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad.
Then it calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ToString%2A> to print a list of the file version information in a text box.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ToString%2A>要打印一份在文本框中的文件版本信息。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
